argument.name: XPos
argument.description: The horizontal coordinate of the last point of the bezier curve.

argument.name: YPos
argument.description: The vertical coordinate of the last point of the bezier curve.

page.description: Finish and draw the a Bezier curve defined by a polygon.
page.discussion: POLY_BEZIER() finishes and draws a smooth bezier curve through the points of the polygon. Limitations: Used only in the Code sections of UI_BITMAP_DRAW(), UI_SCREEN_DRAW(), and UI_PRINTER_DRAW().

section.title: Example
section.example: ui_bitmap_create("test",4,2) ui_bitmap_draw("test",<<%code% inner_Rect(0,0,4,2) set_brush("green") set_pen("black") start_poly(2, .5) lineto(3, 2) lineto(1, 1.5) poly_bezier(2, .5) %code%) ui_dlg_box("","{image=test}")
